page.title: 20(CONT.)SPORTS/ORGANISATIONS
page.content:
{SPORTS}enjoyed include Keep Fit, tennis, badminton, karate, football, sailing, squash, cricket and riding. A car is essential to participate in most of these.
{Local organisations,}which meet for the most part in the Parish Room - again just off the map - are The Horticultural Society (which runs the annual {HARVEST SUPPER}), Cubs, Crossbearers (a young church group), W.I., the P.C.C., the Field Club, Flower Club, Ramblers Club and Wives Group. Dancing classes for children are held on four days a week at the Parish Room.
COMPILED BY V.POWICK AND P.MILLS
SHRAWLEY WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
